explains: adv. 用电子方法，用电子装置

sentences.en: Finally, instead of sending a paper representation of payment such as a check, e-commerce allows one to send payment information electronically.
sentences.cn: 最后，电子商务允许人们通过电子方式发送支付信息，而不是以支票等纸质支付形式。

sentences.en: Passengers can now be ticketed electronically.
sentences.cn: 旅客现在可以电子购票。
